node.title: Healthy Mouth, Healthy Body: Making the Connection
node.description: OBJECTIVES 1. Explore the oral/systemic connections based on current research. 2. Discuss how a NEWSTART lifestyle provides the road-map and power for a healthy mouth, healthy body, happy you! 3. Inspire & equip dental providers to combine dental knowledge with whole-person care to impact not only their patients but their community as well.
